Emissive.comment: (true) SRC_ALPHA to ONE, (false) SRC_ALPHA to ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA

LifeTime.comment: Lifetime of a single particle in seconds
Lifetime of the particle system itself in seconds, zero = endless

MovementCompensationRatio.comment: particle emitting ratio to compensate movement of emitter

RandomRateRange.comment: defines emitted at a random range

Center.comment: in particle matrix, y and z swapped

ThetaRange.comment: in degrees, around y axis, zero is at pos. z

PhiRange.comment: in degrees, around x axis, zero is at pos. z

VelocityScale.comment: This is valid only for global effects. If velocity scale is set to 1, the particles will inherit the exact translation of the emitter at the time they are spawned. If it is set to 2, the particles will inherit double the emitter's translation when they are spawned. 3 is triple the translation, etc.

AlignWithVelocityVectorOperator.comment: if this element exists, particles are aligned like sparks to velocity

AirFrictionOperator.comment: if this element exists, particle speed is calculated together with air friction

LocalEffectOperator.comment: if this element exists, particles exist in parent object's coordinate system
